entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -7.0°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Low minus 14 except minus 20 inland. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
